reviewText:
I might be the only one who managed to pass the first levels of the game heck even the first enemy is a big problem at the beginning. And what do I have to say?

The only way I managed to get through the level is not that obvious;

1st. By Mouse spamming you are able to get a big speed boost which makes it near possible to get through the first enemy.

2nd. Is only using the 2nd guy with his silenced pistol. Although the limit range is higher, you can miss a shot however you want and they won't notice you, untill you were able to get that hit on them since the hitboxes are where the shadow is.

3rd ALOT of patience. I was lucky to study that crap quickly" enough so i didn't gave up and was able to plan each kill precisly as possible.

reviewText: Who designed this? Steam shows that Dynamic Games made this. How is it dynamic in any possible way? This game must have been made by a couple of kids... Nope. For some reason two ADULTS made this game together.., How did they even manage to make a game this bad? How is this even on steam!?!? Its $4.50CDN and they expect you to buy it?! The game looks absolutely horrible for 2014. And don't tell me that its difficult to make those graphics with only two people cause I could do it all in one day! I don't think theres one person in the entire world that could possibly complete the first level only because of how choppy and glitchy the gameplay is! Don't buy it, just dont! I got it for $0.50CDN on sale and I still regret the purchase! I could have bought a nice looking skin for Counter-Strike if I known it was this bad. If it ever becomes free-to-play, get it, it'll at least make you laugh because of how horribly bad it is.

reviewText: Who designed this? Steam shows that Dynamic Games made this. How is it dynamic in any possible way? This game must have been made by a couple of kids... Nope. For some reason two ADULTS made this game together.., How did they even manage to make a game this bad? How is this even on steam!?!? Its $4.50CDN and they expect you to buy it?! The game looks absolutely horrible for 2014. And don't tell me that its difficult to make those graphics with only two people cause I could do it all in one day! I don't think theres one person in the entire world that could possibly complete the first level only because of how choppy and glitchy the gameplay is! Don't buy it, just dont! I got it for $0.50CDN on sale and I still regret the purchase! I could have bought a nice looking skin for Counter-Strike if I known it was this bad. If it ever becomes free-to-play, get it, it'll at least make you laugh because of how horribly bad it is.
